titleStmt.title: A plaine and familiar exposition of the thirteenth and fourteenth chapters of the Prouerbs of Salomon
titleStmt.author: Dod, John, 1549?-1645.
Cleaver, Robert, 1561 or 2-ca. 1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By R.B. for Roger Iackson, and are to be sold at his shop in Fleetstreet, neare the Conduit,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: Iohn Dod, Robert Cleauer.
Errors in paging: p. 90 misnumbered 60, p. 115 repeated in the numbering.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
